name: json-ipc-lib
description: Enables creation and consumption of Unix domain socket based IPC channels between Node.js apps using JSON-RPC 2.0 as a protocol.

scripts.example-client: gulp build && babel test/examples/client.js > test/examples/client-transpiled.js && DEBUG=json-ipc node test/examples/client-transpiled.js
scripts.example-server: gulp build && babel test/examples/server.js > test/examples/server-transpiled.js && DEBUG=json-ipc node test/examples/server-transpiled.js

author: Joshua Thomas (https://github.com/brozeph)
